11.17.18  11:51 am   i've noticed that when i'm frustrated that a song i'm writing is boring, sometimes i'll play it faster or transpose it up and that'll feel like just the ticket. i assume after writing hundreds of songs that this has happened to you at least once or twice. do you have some kind of explanation for this?

11.17.18  11:41 am   Young children are watching your videos (like this one: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mh5LY4Mz15o ) My young nephew told me to watch it.  5 stars for making history exciting for young people!  0 stars for stooping to swear words in your commentary.

        Very disappointing.  I hope the kids learn more about the history than the swear words you're teaching them.

Much love!
